... MINE CITY OF NY LIED TO PROTECT ALL WRONGS....city 1PP and may other powerful enablers 
sound familiar? How do you think Jeffrey Epstein operated in plain sight if he didn't have powerful

https://cyvanceonetermda.blogspot.com/2020/09/cy-vance-enabled-aimes-dr-andrew.html?m=1  Cy 
Vance was it an accident that Dr. Robert Hadden didn't end up on the sex offender registry or like

openly breaking laws to erase crimes for their MD and to send a message to me whistle Blower of 
corruption a message, like Harvey Weinstein's victims it's OK our lives don't matter but these doctors 
they do so they can break laws they can have the NYPD DA ...
